thread.title: Lucknow shootout live updates: Suspected terrorist holed up inside building in Thakurganj
thread.title_full: Lucknow shootout live updates: Suspected terrorist holed up inside building in Thakurganj

title: Lucknow shootout live updates: Suspected terrorist holed up inside building in Thakurganj
text:
Lucknow shootout live updates: Suspected terrorist holed up inside building in Thakurganj Lucknow shootout live updates: Suspected terrorist holed up inside building in Thakurganj The terror suspect has been identified as Saifullah, according to reports. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Updated: March 7, 2017 5:26 pm 
An encounter is currently underway between the Uttar Pradesh Anti Terror Squad and a suspected terrorist in Lucknow’s Thakurganj. The suspect reportedly opened fire at security personnel who were combing the area after receiving a tip-off about the presence of a few suspected terrorists. He has been identified as Saifullah, according to reports. He is currently holed inside a building in the area. Civilians residing nearby have been evacuated from the spot. 
LIVE UPDATES: 
5.17 pm: ADG (Law & Order) briefed the media over the counter terror operation. 
“Had received inputs about presence of some suspects in Kanpur and Lucknow. Our senior officials carried out searches. One suspect was arrested from Kanpur, the second one is inside a building in Thakurganj. He has not come out yet. The suspect inside the building is possibly from Lucknow, we suspect that he is carrying weapons. Hope to arrest him soon, will interrogate thereafter,” he said.
